text: Levi ana dama daane dogodolu: go Gershon, Kohath mo Merari, ala go nia maadua mmaadua o nia madahaanau ala e kila mai nadau ingoo. Gershon ana dama daane dogolua, go Libni mo Shimei. Kohath ana dama daane dogohaa: go Amram, Izhar, Hebron mo Uzziel. Gei Merari ana dama daane dogolua: go Mahli mo Mushi. Digaula la nia maadua mmaadua o nadau madahaanau ala e kila mai nadau ingoo.
